Title: CC.Controls
Description:
A collection of .NET Windows Forms controls developed in C#. Some of the more notable controls are:

- DialogForm
- ImageMarker
- InputBox
- MarginBar
- NumericTextBox
- RichTextBoxEx
- RoundedForm
- WatermarkTextBox
